category: Physical environment; Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
name: Unidentified security compromise, vulnerability or information degradation
description: Security exploitation or vulnerability occurs and is not monitored or identified by repository staff.
notes:
- Are mechanisms in place to identify all system access attempts?
- Are mechanisms in place to determine when and how changes to stored content have taken place?
- Are system logs regularly analysed to seek evidence of security breaches or attempted breaches? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes: - System is hacked and key logger installed without knowledge of systems staff
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Undertake appropriate measures to limit likelihood of system compromises, and implement monitoring to detect where attempts have taken place in accordance with relevant standards In the event of riskâ€™s execution:
- Allocate staff time to analyse system logs for details of security compromises
- Rebuild system to ensure there are no residual effects
identifiedBy: DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment
